ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sorry for the confusion, guys -- we had a problem with our DNS (domain-name-servers) which caused the fsgames.com site to vanish for about two days. This
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 50
Message-ID: <17248.50.133.959279670@...>
Date: Thu, 16 Sep 1999 16:01:41 -0400
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Re: FSGames...?


>From: Cookie <cookie@...>
>
>Okay, I'll admit it's been a while since i last played Gladiator (can we
>say "school"? X_x) however, i was just wondering...
>
>uhm...
>
>"What happened to fsgames.com"?? :P
>
>I can't get to the site anymore, nor have I been able to for a while. Tom?
>:( Did you shut down? Didja move? Wanna enlighten us poor souls out here? :(
>-Cookie

Sorry for the confusion, guys -- we had a problem with our DNS 
(domain-name-servers) which caused the "fsgames.com" site to vanish for 
about two days. This affected both our web pages, and e-mail to us (ie, the 
tricket@... address wouldn't go through).  Hopefully, it's all 
fixed now :)

--Tom
